mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, REPORT_ID, RE_TITLE, RE_CONTENT, RE_FILE, RE_DATE from (select * from REPORT join report_sign using(report_id) where member_id = #{ keyword } order by re_date desc, report_id desc)) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}

WITH report_ids AS ( SELECT TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(report_id, 3)) AS report_num FROM report ), min_report_num AS ( SELECT MIN(report_ids.report_num) as min_report_num FROM report_ids ), max_report_num AS ( SELECT MAX(report_ids.report_num) as max_report_num FROM report_ids ) SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT LEVEL + min_report_num.min_report_num - 1 as num FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (max_report_num.max_report_num - min_report_num.min_report_num + 1) ) generated_nums WHERE num NOT IN (SELECT report_num FROM report_ids) ) THEN 're' || LPAD((SELECT MIN(num) FROM ( SELECT LEVEL + min_report_num.min_report_num - 1 as num FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (max_report_num.max_report_num - min_report_num.min_report_num + 1) ) generated_nums WHERE num NOT IN (SELECT report_num FROM report_ids) ), 4, '0') ELSE 're' || LPAD(max_report_num.max_report_num + 1, 4, '0') END AS report_id FROM min_report_num, max_report_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Report (REPORT_ID, RE_TITLE, RE_CONTENT, RE_FILE, RE_DATE) VALUES (#{ reportId }, '임시저장', '임시저장', NULL, sysdate)
